Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll

Class CourseRoll

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.roll.CourseRoll
  • public class CourseRoll
extends java.lang.Object
    CourseRoll holds a list of all studnets enrolled in a course and has a parameter for the enrollment cap of the course CourseRoll can enroll and drop students from a Course, check if a student can enroll, and return open seats in course
    Author:
    Kelsey Hanser, Daniel Nolting, Nick Bleuzen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CourseRoll​(Course c, int enrollmentCap)
      Constructor for CourseRoll Initializes list to an empty list with capacity of enrollmentCap and sets enrollmentCap to enrollmentCap

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean canEnroll​(Student s)
      Checks if a student can enroll in class by checking if there are open seats in the class or its waitlist and if the student is already enrolled in class
      void drop​(Student s)
      Removes student from roll
      void enroll​(Student s)
      Checks if student can enroll in class and if they can, adds them to list of students in class
      int getEnrollmentCap()
      Returns enrollmentCap
      int getNumberOnWaitlist()
      Returns the current number of Students on the waitlist
      int getOpenSeats()
      Returns the number of seats open in the class, which is enrollmentCap minus the number of Students in the class
      void setEnrollmentCap​(int enrollmentCap)
      Sets enrollmentCap to enrollmentCap passed in if enrollmentCap is more than the minimum number of students that can be enrolled in a class, less than the maximum number of students that can be enrolled in class, and is greater than the number of students already in the class

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public CourseRoll​(Course c,
                  int enrollmentCap)
        Constructor for CourseRoll Initializes list to an empty list with capacity of enrollmentCap and sets enrollmentCap to enrollmentCap
        Parameters:
        c - the Course the CourseRoll is associated with
        enrollmentCap - maximum number of students that can enroll in course

    • Method Detail

      • getEnrollmentCap

        public int getEnrollmentCap()
        Returns enrollmentCap
        Returns:
        enrollmentCap field

      • setEnrollmentCap

        public void setEnrollmentCap​(int enrollmentCap)
        Sets enrollmentCap to enrollmentCap passed in if enrollmentCap is more than the minimum number of students that can be enrolled in a class, less than the maximum number of students that can be enrolled in class, and is greater than the number of students already in the class
        Parameters:
        enrollmentCap - to be set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if enrollmentCap is not correct

      • getOpenSeats

        public int getOpenSeats()
        Returns the number of seats open in the class, which is enrollmentCap minus the number of Students in the class
        Returns:
        the number of open seats in the class

      • enroll

        public void enroll​(Student s)
        Checks if student can enroll in class and if they can, adds them to list of students in class
        Parameters:
        s - Student to be enrolled in class
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if s is null or can't enroll in class

      • drop

        public void drop​(Student s)
        Removes student from roll
        Parameters:
        s - Student to be dropped from class
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if s is null

      • canEnroll

        public boolean canEnroll​(Student s)
        Checks if a student can enroll in class by checking if there are open seats in the class or its waitlist and if the student is already enrolled in class
        Parameters:
        s - Student to check if they can enroll
        Returns:
        false if they can't enroll in class true if they can enroll in class

      • getNumberOnWaitlist

        public int getNumberOnWaitlist()
        Returns the current number of Students on the waitlist
        Returns:
        the current number of Students on the waitlist
